description.zh-cn: 位于东南亚的联邦制、议会民主制、选举君主制和君主立宪制国家。
description.en: A federal, parliamentary democracy, elective monarchy, and constitutional monarchy country located in Southeast Asia.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚的前身，于1957年8月31日从英国独立。
description.en: Predecessor to Malaysia, gained independence from the United Kingdom on 31 August 1957.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚的邦，位于婆罗洲北部，旧称北婆罗洲。
description.en: A state of Malaysia located on the northern portion of Borneo, formerly known as North Borneo.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚的邦，位于婆罗洲。
description.en: A state of Malaysia on the island of Borneo.

description.zh-cn: 东南亚岛国和城邦。曾于1963年至1965年加入马来西亚联邦。
description.en: An island city-state in Southeast Asia. It was a state of Malaysia from 1963 to 1965.

description.zh-cn: 一份合并北婆罗洲、砂拉越和新加坡与马来亚联合邦的文件，由此建立了马来西亚联邦。
description.en: The agreement which combined North Borneo, Sarawak, and Singapore with the existing states of the Federation of Malaya, the resulting union being named Malaysia.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚第十七任最高元首。
description.en: The 17th Yang di-Pertuan Agong of Malaysia.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚第十任首相。
description.en: The 10th Prime Minister of Malaysia.

description.zh-cn: 历史上最大的殖民帝国，曾殖民统治马来亚、砂拉越及北婆罗洲。
description.en: The largest colonial empire in history, which colonized Malaya, Sarawak, and North Borneo.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚政府与新加坡政府签订的协议，确认新加坡从马来西亚联邦独立。
description.en: The agreement between the Government of Malaysia and the Government of Singapore that confirmed Singapore's independence from the Federation of Malaysia.

description.zh-cn: 建立了马六甲苏丹王朝的王子。
description.en: The prince who founded the Malacca Sultanate.

description.zh-cn: 被普遍认定为马来半岛的第一个独立国家。
description.en: Widely considered to be the first independent state on the Malay Peninsula.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲国家，于1511年攻占马六甲并建立殖民地。
description.en: A European country that captured Malacca in 1511 and established a colony.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲国家，于1641年联合柔佛攻下葡属马六甲。
description.en: A European country that, in alliance with Johor, captured Portuguese Malacca in 1641.

description.zh-cn: 由马六甲末代苏丹之子建立的王朝，曾是对抗葡萄牙的主要势力之一。
description.en: A sultanate founded by the son of the last Sultan of Malacca, which was one of the main forces opposing the Portuguese.

description.zh-cn: 东亚国家，在第二次世界大战期间占领了马来亚。
description.en: An East Asian country that occupied Malaya during World War II.

description.zh-cn: 全球性的军事冲突，期间日本占领了马来亚。
description.en: A global military conflict during which Japan occupied Malaya.

description.zh-cn: 在马来亚从事反殖民武装斗争的政党。
description.en: A political party that engaged in an anti-colonial armed struggle in Malaya.

description.zh-cn: 马来亚共产党游击队与英联邦军队之间的反游击队战争时期。
description.en: A period of anti-guerrilla warfare between the Malayan Communist Party's guerrillas and Commonwealth forces.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚国父及第一任首相。
description.en: The founding father of Malaysia and its first Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 印度尼西亚第一任总统，曾反对马来西亚的成立。
description.en: The first President of Indonesia, who opposed the formation of Malaysia.

zh-cn: 印度尼西亚－马来西亚冲突

description.zh-cn: 印度尼西亚因反对马来西亚成立而引发的武装冲突。
description.en: An armed conflict stemming from Indonesia's opposition to the formation of Malaysia.

description.zh-cn: 1969年大选后在吉隆坡发生的严重种族冲突事件。
description.en: A serious racial riot incident that occurred in Kuala Lumpur after the 1969 general election.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚的一个政党联盟，由1973年至2018年长期执政。
description.en: A political coalition in Malaysia that was the ruling coalition from 1973 to 2018.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚第二任首相，推行新经济政策。
description.en: The second Prime Minister of Malaysia, who introduced the New Economic Policy.

description.zh-cn: 一项旨在通过配额制提高土著经济权益比例的社会经济重组政策。
description.en: A socio-economic restructuring policy aimed at increasing the economic equity of the Bumiputera through a quota system.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚第四及第七任首相，任内推动国家快速经济成长。
description.en: The fourth and seventh Prime Minister of Malaysia, who oversaw a period of rapid economic growth.

description.zh-cn: 1997年爆发的一场席卷亚洲多国的金融风暴，对马来西亚经济造成严重打击。
description.en: A financial crisis that gripped much of East and Southeast Asia beginning in 1997, severely impacting Malaysia's economy.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚第六任首相，任内设立了一个马来西亚发展有限公司。
description.en: The sixth Prime Minister of Malaysia, who established 1Malaysia Development Berhad (1MDB).

nodes.id: 一个马来西亚发展有限公司

zh-cn: 一个马来西亚发展有限公司

description.zh-cn: 由时任首相纳吉设立的战略发展公司，后卷入贪腐丑闻。
description.en: A strategic development company established by then-Prime Minister Najib Razak, which later became embroiled in a corruption scandal.

nodes.id: 一个马来西亚有限公司丑闻

zh-cn: 一个马来西亚有限公司丑闻

description.zh-cn: 涉及一个马来西亚发展有限公司（1MDB）的大型贪腐、贿赂和洗钱丑闻。
description.en: A major corruption, bribery, and money laundering scandal involving 1Malaysia Development Berhad (1MDB).

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚的一个政党联盟，在2018年大选中获胜，实现首次政党轮替。
description.en: A political coalition in Malaysia that won the 2018 general election, leading to the first regime change in the country's history.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚第14届全国大选，导致了该国历史上首次政党轮替。
description.en: The 14th Malaysian general election, which resulted in the first-ever transition of power in the country's history.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚第八任首相。
description.en: The 8th Prime Minister of Malaysia.

description.zh-cn: 导致希望联盟政府倒台的政治危机。
description.en: A political crisis that led to the collapse of the Pakatan Harapan government.

description.zh-cn: 马来亚联合邦与北婆罗洲（今沙巴）、砂拉越及新加坡共同组成马来西亚联邦。
description.en: The Federation of Malaya, together with North Borneo (present-day Sabah), Sarawak, and Singapore, formed the Federation of Malaysia.

description.zh-cn: 北婆罗洲（今沙巴）与马来亚联合邦、砂拉越及新加坡共同组成马来西亚联邦。
description.en: North Borneo (present-day Sabah), together with the Federation of Malaya, Sarawak, and Singapore, formed the Federation of Malaysia.

description.zh-cn: 砂拉越与马来亚联合邦、北婆罗洲（今沙巴）及新加坡共同组成马来西亚联邦。
description.en: Sarawak, together with the Federation of Malaya, North Borneo (present-day Sabah), and Singapore, formed the Federation of Malaysia.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡与马来亚联合邦、北婆罗洲（今沙巴）及砂拉越共同组成马来西亚联邦，后于1965年退出。
description.en: Singapore, together with the Federation of Malaya, North Borneo (present-day Sabah), and Sarawak, formed the Federation of Malaysia, but later seceded in 1965.

description.zh-cn: 该协定促成了马来西亚联邦的建立。
description.en: This agreement led to the establishment of the Federation of Malaysia.

description.zh-cn: 该协议确认了新加坡从马来西亚联邦独立，成为一个主权国家。
description.en: This agreement confirmed Singapore's independence from the Federation of Malaysia, making it a sovereign state.

description.zh-cn: 马来亚联合邦原为英国保护国，于1957年8月31日独立。
description.en: The Federation of Malaya was a British protectorate until it gained independence on August 31, 1957.

description.zh-cn: 担任马来西亚国家元首。
description.en: Serves as the head of state of Malaysia.

description.zh-cn: 担任马来西亚政府首脑。
description.en: Serves as the head of government of Malaysia.

description.zh-cn: 来自三佛齐皇室的王子拜里米苏拉建立了马六甲苏丹王朝。
description.en: Parameswara, a prince from the Srivijayan royal house, founded the Malacca Sultanate.

description.zh-cn: 1511年，葡萄牙舰队攻占马六甲，导致马六甲苏丹王朝在马六甲的统治终结。
description.en: In 1511, a Portuguese fleet captured Malacca, ending the rule of the Malacca Sultanate in the city.

description.zh-cn: 荷兰于1641年联合柔佛攻下葡属马六甲。
description.en: The Dutch, in alliance with Johor, captured Portuguese Malacca in 1641.

description.zh-cn: 柔佛王朝于1641年联合荷兰攻下葡属马六甲。
description.en: The Johor Sultanate, in alliance with the Dutch, captured Portuguese Malacca in 1641.

description.zh-cn: 在第二次世界大战期间，日本占领了英属马来亚。
description.en: During World War II, Japan occupied British Malaya.

description.zh-cn: 马来亚共产党在马来亚紧急状态期间与英国殖民政府及英联邦军队进行武装斗争。
description.en: The Malayan Communist Party engaged in armed struggle against the British colonial government and Commonwealth forces during the Malayan Emergency.

description.zh-cn: 担任马来亚联合邦第一任首相。
description.en: Served as the first Prime Minister of the Federation of Malaya.

description.zh-cn: 印度尼西亚总统苏卡诺反对马来西亚的成立，并引发了马印对抗。
description.en: Indonesian President Sukarno opposed the formation of Malaysia, leading to the Indonesia-Malaysia confrontation.

description.zh-cn: 在时任首相阿都拉萨的领导下，马来西亚政府开始推行新经济政策。
description.en: Under the leadership of then-Prime Minister Abdul Razak, the Malaysian government began implementing the New Economic Policy.

description.zh-cn: 1997-1998年的亚洲金融危机使马来西亚的经济和政局严重受挫。
description.en: The Asian financial crisis of 1997-1998 severely set back Malaysia's economy and political situation.

description.zh-cn: 在1998年亚洲金融危机期间，首相马哈迪拒绝了副首相安华的经济政策建议，两人关系破裂，安华被革职。
description.en: During the 1998 Asian financial crisis, Prime Minister Mahathir rejected Deputy Prime Minister Anwar's economic policy proposals, leading to a rupture in their relationship and Anwar's dismissal.

relationships.target: 一个马来西亚发展有限公司

description.zh-cn: 时任首相纳吉·阿都拉萨设立了一个马来西亚发展有限公司（1MDB）。
description.en: Then-Prime Minister Najib Razak established 1Malaysia Development Berhad (1MDB).

relationships.source: 一个马来西亚有限公司丑闻

description.zh-cn: 1MDB丑闻导致对纳吉的广泛批评和法律诉讼，最终导致其下台和被判有罪。
description.en: The 1MDB scandal led to widespread criticism and legal action against Najib, contributing to his downfall and eventual conviction.

description.zh-cn: 国民阵线在2018年大选中败给希望联盟，结束了长达61年的执政。
description.en: Barisan Nasional was defeated by Pakatan Harapan in the 2018 general election, ending its 61-year-long rule.

description.zh-cn: 希望联盟在2018年大选中获胜，成为执政联盟。
description.en: Pakatan Harapan won the 2018 general election, becoming the ruling coalition.

description.zh-cn: 在2020年政治危机中，慕尤丁领导土著团结党退出希望联盟并组成新政府，马哈迪形容其做法为背叛。
description.en: During the 2020 political crisis, Muhyiddin led his party out of Pakatan Harapan to form a new government, an act Mahathir described as a betrayal.

description.zh-cn: 2020年的政治危机导致希望联盟政府倒台。
description.en: The 2020 political crisis led to the collapse of the Pakatan Harapan government.
